com.couchbase.kafka

Class CouchbaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.couchbase.kafka.CouchbaseConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class CouchbaseConnector
extends Object
implements Runnable
    CouchbaseConnector is an entry point of the library. It sets up connections with both Couchbase and Kafka clusters. And carries all events from Couchbase to Kafka.

    The example below will transfer all mutations from Couchbase bucket "my-bucket" as JSON to Kafka topic "my-topic". 
     
  DefaultCouchbaseEnvironment.Builder builder =
        (DefaultCouchbaseEnvironment.Builder) DefaultCouchbaseEnvironment.builder()
           .kafkaFilterClass("kafka.serializer.StringEncoder")
           .kafkaValueSerializerClass("com.couchbase.kafka.coder.JsonEncoder")
           .dcpEnabled(true);
  CouchbaseEnvironment env = builder.build();
  CouchbaseConnector connector = CouchbaseConnector.create(env,
                 "couchbase.example.com", "my-bucket", "pass",
                 "kafka.example.com", "my-topic");
  connector.run();
    Author:
    Sergey Avseyev

      • buildState

        public com.couchbase.client.core.dcp.BucketStreamAggregatorState buildState(Direction direction)
        Builds BucketStreamAggregatorState using current state of the bucket.
        Parameters:
        direction - defines the range which should be defined. The current state of the streams is pivot, Direction.TO_CURRENT will represent all changes happened before current state, and Direction.FROM_CURRENT represents changes that will happen in the future.
        Returns:
        BucketStreamAggregatorState

      • create

        Returns:
        configured CouchbaseConnector

      • create

        public static CouchbaseConnector create(List<String> couchbaseNodes,
                                        String couchbaseBucket,
                                        String couchbasePassword,
                                        CouchbaseEnvironment environment)
        Create CouchbaseConnector with specified settings.
        Parameters:
        couchbaseNodes - address of Couchbase node to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbaseNodes().
        couchbaseBucket - name of Couchbase bucket to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbaseBucket().
        couchbasePassword - password for Couchbase bucket to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbasePassword().
        environment - environment object
        Returns:
        configured CouchbaseConnector
